short_descriptions.es: Servicio manejado de Spark y Hadoop
short_descriptions.en: Google managed service for Spark and Hadoop

descriptions.es: Dataproc es un servicio manejado de Spark y Hadoop que permite sacar provecho de herramientas open source para procesamiento de datos en batch, streaming y machine learning
descriptions.en: Dataproc is a managed Spark and Hadoop service that lets you take advantage of open source data tools for batch processing, querying, streaming, and machine learning
